name: Scroll Of Life
description:
Scroll Of Life - is a 2D adventure puzzle platformer, the world of which is filled with all kinds of monsters and traps, each level is similar to the previous one, but different in construction. And if you are distracted for a while, you will fall into the hands of monsters!

You have to take on the role of a traveler who, not armed with weapons, went to wander the world in search of the scrolls of life. What's in store for him? You can only guess.

Be ready to overcome all the dangers on your way, but do not forget if you hurry up death will overtake you.

Features of the game:
- Nice pixel graphics
- Soundtrack perfectly complements the game
- Many different levels

Good luck with your adventure, traveler!
